description: Docker has issued security updates to address a critical vulnerability impacting certain versions of Docker Engine that could allow an attacker to bypass authorization plugins (AuthZ) under certain circumstances. [...]
title: Docker fixes critical 5-year old authentication bypass flaw

description: Microsoft has fixed a known Windows 10 update issue that broke Microsoft Connected Cache (MCC) node discovery on enterprise networks. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes bug behind Windows 10 Connected Cache delivery issues

description: American cybersecurity company KnowBe4 says a person it recently hired as a Principal Software Engineer turned out to be a North Korean state actor who attempted to install information-stealing on its devices. [...]
title: KnowBe4 mistakenly hires North Korean hacker, faces infostealer attack

description: Google Chrome now warns when downloading risky password-protected files and provides improved alerts with more information about potentially malicious downloaded files. [...]
title: Google Chrome now warns about risky password-protected archives

description: CrowdStrike released a Preliminary Post Incident Review (PIR) on the faulty Falcon update explaining that a bug allowed bad data to pass its Content Validator and cause millions of Windows systems to crash on July 19, 2024. [...]
title: CrowdStrike: 'Content Validator' bug let faulty update pass checks

description: Now that the mWISE 2024 session catalog is out, it's time to take a closer look at the topics. Learn more from @mWISEConference about the three hottest tracks in this year's conference. [...]
title: Hot topics: Can’t-miss sessions at Mandiant’s 2024 mWISE event

description: Microsoft warned that some Windows devices will boot into BitLocker recovery after installing the July 2024 Windows security updates. [...]
title: Windows July security updates send PCs into BitLocker recovery

description: The entire database for the notorious BreachForums v1 hacking forum was released on Telegram Tuesday night, exposing a treasure trove of data, including members' information, private messages, cryptocurrency addresses, and every post on the forum. [...]
title: BreachForums v1 database leak is an OPSEC test for hackers
